ministry.name: Intercessory Prayer Ministry
ministry.overview: The Intercessory Prayer Ministry meets every Sunday during 2nd service in the Prayer Room to pray and interceed for a number of causes.

long-description.p: We are a prayer team that meets every Sunday during 2nd service in the Prayer Room. We pray and interceed for Calvary Chapel Austin, Leadership, Staff, Ministries and events, service times, new believers, our missionaries, world events, government, etc.
long-description.verse: Even them will I bring to My holy mountain, and make them joyful in my house of prayer. Their burnt offerings and their sacrifices will be accepted upon My alter; for My house shall be called a house of prayer for all nations.
long-description.p: This prayer team is open to anyone from any age group and any ministry that wants to participate.
